Modules

api.lib.activation module

Contains simple activation functions.

api.lib.activation.gaussian(x)

Gaussian function

api.lib.activation.relu(x)

Rectified linear activation.

api.lib.activation.sigmoid(x)

Logistic(sigmoid) activation.

api.lib.activation.softmax(x)

Normalized exponential function

api.lib.activation.tanh(x)

Hyperbolic tangent.

api.lib.loss module

Contains simple loss functions.

api.lib.loss.crossentropy(predictions, targets)

Categorical crossentropy

api.lib.loss.mse(predictions, targets)

Mean squared error

api.lib.model module

Contains Model definition.

class api.lib.model.Model(layers=None, loss=None, optimizer=None)

Bases: object

Create a model that contains all the layers and has an interface to work with them.

add(layer)

Add layer to the model.

fit(x_train, y_train, epochs, *args, **kwargs)

Train model.

predict(data)

Predict output with given input.
